document.masterDocTitle: Catalog of the subgenus Melanoconion of Culex (Diptera: Culicidae) for South America

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalog of the subgenus Melanoconion of Culex (Diptera: Culicidae) for South America

materialsCitation.stateProvince: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Lectotype
Larval exuviae (with associated pupal exuviae, M): Santa Lucrecia , ( Veracruz ), Mexico ( NMNH ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in South America :
Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Colombia, Ecuador, French Guiana, Republic of Paraguay, Republic of Suriname, Venezuela. Type locality: Santa Lucrecia, (Veracruz), Mexico
